name: Genetic Algorithm for Multi-Objective Optimization
summary: Genetic Algorithms are used to solve problems that seek to attain the best value on multiple metrics. For example, in the case of a car, we would want to maximize speed and minimize fuel consumption. In this project, I implement an algorithm that solves a similar problem, but for the purpose of designing Optimal Satellite Configurations. My algorithm achieves comprable results to the state-of-the-art algorithms, and demonstrates the ability to find better solutions under a shorted timeframe.
